title: What does it mean to be 'balanced' in naturopathy? How can we achieve balance in our lives?
description: Answer (1 of 3): In naturopathy, the concept of balance refers to the idea that the body has an innate ability to heal itself and maintain health when all of its systems are in a state of equilibrium.
